content: @MissBeeBright @GraduateHotels I discovered @GraduateHotels last year when a lot of the schools my daughter is interested in seeing this year happen to be in cities with one - Ann Arbor, Chapel Hill, New Haven, Providence off the top of my head. They seem like a great place to stay to soak up the local area.
